text: Whisky is a Uruguayan movie that is both funny and sad (tragicomic). It was directed by Juan Pablo Rebella and Pablo Stoll. It was released in 2004. The movie stars Andr√©s Pazos, Mirella Pascual, Jorge Bolani, Ana Katz, and Daniel Hendler. The actors do not talk much or show much feeling. It was first shown at the 2004 Cannes Film Festival, where it won the Un Certain Regard and FIPRESCI Awards.It was Juan Pablo Rebella's last movie before he died in 2006. ==Other websites== * * Category:2004 comedy-drama movies Category:Uruguayan movies Category:Argentine comedy movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:German comedy movies Category:German drama movies Category:Spanish comedy movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Pablo Stoll Category:Movies set in Uruguay Category:Movies about alcohol
title: Whisky (movie)
